title: Autodesk, Singapore
subtitle: Devops Intern
content: Migrated Servers from ECS Vapour to Azure
Automated deployment to both AWS and Azure with Hashicorp tools like Terraform, Packer with Jenkins
Azure tools, Blob/Queue Storage, VM/VMSS, Compute Gallery

title: Switcheo, Singapore

title: Delvify, Singapore
subtitle: Fullstack Intern
content: Built Dashboard layout in React, data fetched from PSQL database via express backend
Deployed in AWS EC2 with docker
React and Redux frontend. Displayed Graph and Charts with React Chart. Express nodejs backend
Interacted with the database via Sequelize ORM. Query and aggregated the data with SQL language
